_header: On the tree he has I-born
_description: Christ died for our sins — one couplet in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
On þe tre he hatȝ ibornOure sennes for wiche we weren
                    forlorn
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 5.
